name: CLKComplicationTemplateModularLargeTallBody
desc: A template for displaying a header row and row of tall body text.

items.name: init(headerTextProvider: CLKTextProvider, bodyTextProvider: CLKTextProvider)
items.desc: Creates a template that has a header and a row of tall body text.

items.name: var headerTextProvider: CLKTextProvider
items.desc: The text to display in the header line.

items.name: var bodyTextProvider: CLKTextProvider
items.desc: The text to display in the body line.
